{{Description|Kaeya seems affable, but his nature is that of unyielding ice.}}
'''Frostgnaw''' is [[Kaeya]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*{{Talent Note|particles|2.67}}
*Frostgnaw uniquely applies '''4U''' of {{Cryo}} on [[water]] and [[freeze]]s it for 8 seconds. As Frostgnaw's cooldown is only 6 seconds, Kaeya can freeze the water in front of him and walk across it indefinitely as long as Frostgnaw is constantly used.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
*{{Talent Note|character=Kaeya|talent=Frostgnaw|ascension|1|Cold-Blooded Strike}}
*{{Talent Note|character=Kaeya|talent=Frostgnaw|ascension|2|Glacial Heart}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
*{{Talent Note|constellation|3|Dance of Frost}}
